# waiter

[![Experimental version](https://img.shields.io/badge/-experimental-red)](#) [![Get package from npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@erbelion/waiter?logo=npm&logoColor=white&style=flat&label=)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@erbelion/waiter) [![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dw/@erbelion/waiter?color=blue&label=&logoColor=white&style=flat&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@erbelion/waiter) [![views](https://views.erbek.space/api/views.svg?id=github.com%2Ferbelion%2Fwaiter)](https://views.erbek.space/page/?id=github.com%2Ferbelion%2Fwaiter) [![likes](https://views.erbek.space/api/likes.svg?id=github.com%2Ferbelion%2Fwaiter)](https://views.erbek.space/api/like?id=github.com%2Ferbelion%2Fwaiter)

simple ready waiter made in vanilla ts

## Installation
**yarn**
```
yarn add @erbelion/waiter
```
**npm**
```
npm i @erbelion/waiter
```

## Usage
[see tests](https://github.com/erbelion/waiter/blob/main/tests/index.test.ts)
